prompt:
Create a circular pattern of revolved features: 
1) In a new Part Studio, create a small rectangle (5mm x 10mm) on the Right plane (YZ plane), offset from the Y-axis by 20mm in Z (e.g., Z from 20 to 25, Y from 0 to 10).
2) Revolve this rectangle 360 degrees around the Y-axis to create a solid ring.
3) Create a circular pattern of this ring (4 instances around the Y-axis).
Use explicit mm units.
